channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-13571] ServerSocketUtil.getPort() should use loopback address, not 0.0.0.0
item.description: Using 0.0.0.0 to check for a free port will succeed even if there's something bound to that same port on the loopback interface. Since this function is used primarily in testing, it should be checking the loopback interface for free ports.
item.summary: ServerSocketUtil.getPort() should use loopback address, not 0.0.0.0

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attaching patch to have ServerSocketUtil.getPort() bind to loopback instead of 0.0.0.0.

+1 overall
